feed.title: Keshav Bansal
feed.subtitle: Welcome to my digital space, where I chronicle my adventures in technology and learning. My goal is to regularly update this site with engaging blog posts, insightful book and paper reviews, and innovative project developments. I hope that visitors to my website leave with a smile, having gained new knowledge and feeling inspired to explore and create. Join me on this exciting journey of continuous growth and discovery!

entry.title: Some articles are just so short that we have to make the footer stick
